full_text: al F 5 ae a Sopa 2014/KER/61 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE B.P.RAY WEDNESDAY, THE 1ST DAY OF JANUARY 2014/11TH POUSHA, 1935 Crl.MC.No. 4527 of 2011 () (CRMPNO. 2270/2011 IN CRRP.NO.50/2011 OF SESSIONS COURT, PALAKKAD DATED 30/11/2011) PETITIONER/REVISION PETITIONER/COMPLAINANT: MURALI NARAYANAN, AGED 53 YEARS, S/O.CHANDRASEKHARA MENON, AYUR HEALTH CARE CENTRE, SAHYADRI COLONY, CHANDRANAGAR, NOW RESIDING AT NEAR THE SANKER THEATRE, NAITHALATHUVEEDU, THATHAMANGALAM, CHITTUR.
